subject: Assert style
msgSnippet: When you put a message in an assert(), does your message reflect the true state (indicating what you re actually asserting) or the failure state (which is when
messageBody:
When you put a message in an assert(), does your message reflect the
true state (indicating what you're actually asserting) or the failure
state (which is when you actually see the message).
